products.title: Pile of bones, medium
products.description: A pile of medium sized bones, perfect for decorating your dungeon!

products.title: Wooden treasure chest
products.description: A sturdy wooden chest, great for storing adventurer rewards such as gems and magical items!

products.title: Green Slime
products.description: A classic dungeon monster. Can stick to walls and spew acid. Comes in all different sizes!

products.title: Mimic
products.description: You want to trick those pesky adventurers? Get a mimic! Combined with furniture like the treasure chest you're guaranteed to get some adventurer's corpses!

products.title: Beholder
products.description: Possibly the most iconic monster from Pungence and Flagons. A great pick for a a boss-fight. Contact us for different varieties!

products.title: Spike trap, wood
products.description: A wooden spike trap. Make your adventurers weary of the dangers ahead!
